entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump You will never "recover" from the impact of coronavirus while you allow it to run rampant and kill people by the 10s of 1000s.  We're back to work with only 6.2% unemployment here in Australia cause our government is competent.  Trump & his enablers have destroyed America.
